name: session-management
description: 6-phase workflow coordination for session management. Manages context across sessions, implements checkpoint/resume patterns, and tracks progress through complex multi-step tasks. Use when: starting new sessions, resuming work, managing long-running tasks.

inputs.name: action
inputs.description: Action: start, resume, checkpoint, summary, handoff

inputs.name: context
inputs.description: Current context or summary to persist

chainOfThought: 1. Identify current session state (new/existing). 2. For new sessions: scan CLAUDE.md, check git status, identify active tasks. 3. For resume: load last checkpoint, summarize progress, identify next steps. 4. Create checkpoint with: completed items, current state, open items, blockers. 5. For handoff: generate comprehensive summary for next session.
